experience.description: Worked as an intern, contributed to several modules for the company's HRIS software including the Raise Ticket module, and Attendance module, developed the landing page, and prepared complete system documentation.
Worked as a content writer to publish content on multiple trending topics ranging from celebrities, news, and lifestyle articles.
